description:
QCSS brings together corporations of fine quality to create the consensus quality-certification platform token advantage of tamper-resistant and distributed ledgers of Blockchain’s feature.

QCSS based on Blockchain will build a decentralized and objective rating system of quality of commodity in order for survival of the fittest. The ultimate purpose of QCSS is to realize the corporation and consumer’s win-win ecosystem and draw in more and more fine qualities e-business and corporations.

By the sub-chain and DApp of landing project, QCSS will solve problems such as information tracing, anti-false verification and accurate marketing in the process from commodity production to consumption based on the digitized certification and information storage.

Every has its own quality. It will be in reality to make reliable commercial system through certification and rating of QCSS platform.
name: Quality Control Safety System
